titles.title: A bill to amend the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to require congressional approval of certain actions, and for other purposes.
A bill to amend the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to require congressional approval of certain actions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: This bill requires congressional approval to list, remove from a list, or change the status of any endangered species or threatened species.
